text: Zbarazh (Ukrainian: Збараж, Polish: Zbaraż, Yiddish: זבאריזש Zbarizh) is a city in the Ternopil Oblast (province) of western Ukraine. It is the administrative center of the Zbarazh Raion (district), and is located in the historic region of Galicia. ==Other websites== * Zbarazh in Encyclopedia of Ukraine, vol. 5 (1993) Category:Cities in Ternopil Oblast
title: Zbarazh
